thread.section_title: Devon Valley Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good, comfortable room with lovely views
thread.title_full: Good, comfortable room with lovely views - Review of Devon Valley Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: MrsBritain27
title: Good, comfortable room with lovely views
text: We stayed here as part of a Riviera Travel group in February. Our room had fantastic views and was very quiet. We were able to watch the wild birds strutting about. Good comfortable beds and the service and food both excellent.Clean room, bathroom a bit old fashioned but adequate.
